mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Game_TB(game_no,category,name,rel_day,developer,content,min_spec,recom_spec,poster,like_cnt,hate_cnt,price,tag,movie) VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(game_no)+1,1) FROM Game_TB), #{category}, #{name}, #{rel_day}, #{developer}, #{content}, #{min_spec}, #{recom_spec}, #{poster}, #{like_cnt}, #{hate_cnt}, #{price}, #{tag}, #{movie} )
mapper.select: SELECT game_no,name,poster,price,num FROM (SELECT game_no,name,poster,price, rownum as num FROM (SELECT game_no,name,poster,price FROM game_tb WHERE cateno=#{category} ORDER BY game_no)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
